casebody.data:
Joan A. MEINCK
v.
CITY OF GASTONIA, a North Carolina Municipal Corporation No. 130PA17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Meinck, Joan A. Martha Raymond Thompson, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, Ryan L. Bostic, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Aaron C. Low, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, for City of Gastonia. Andrew J. Santaniello, Attorney at Law, Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Associate General Counsel, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al. Huntington M. Willis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, William R. Terpening, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of February 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
